6DM1.SG.long_name: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited
6DM1.SG.summary: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals. The company owns and manages 6 hospital groups, including Bangkok Hospital Group, Samitivej Hospital Group, BNH Hospital, Phyathai Hospital Group, Paolo Hospital Group, and Royal Hospital Group. It operates regenerative and preventive wellness clinics. In addition, the company operates hotels and restaurant; sells health foods; provides accounting, health insurance, laboratory services, investment, information technology, training, insurance brokerage, air medical transportation, and property management services, as well as asset management services; and manufactures and distributes medicine and pharmaceutical products. Further, it is involved in the e-commerce business. As of December 31, 2020, the company operates 49 hospitals in Thailand and Cambodia. Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AHC-R.BK.summary: Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited provides medical and nursing care services under the Aikchol Hospital trademark in Thailand. The company offers hospital services, including diseases protection, medical treatment, health strengthening, and health rehabilitation services with 340 beds in service. It serves primarily individuals, group of policyholders of the insurance company, group of contract parties' company, and group of insured on social security. Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

AHC.BK.summary: Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited provides medical and nursing care services under the Aikchol Hospital trademark in Thailand. Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

BCH.BK.long_name: Bangkok Chain Hospital Public Company Limited
BCH.BK.summary: Bangkok Chain Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of hospitals in Thailand. It operates thirteen chained hospital branches and one polyclinic. The company also offers tertiary care and diagnosis services; and consulting, operating management, and asset management and procurement services, as well as rents properties. In addition, it sells healthy drinks; and provides medical analysis and research services. Bangkok Chain Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

BH-R.BK.summary: Bumrungrad Hospital Public Company Limited owns and operates healthcare-related entities in Thailand and internationally. The company offers diagnostic, therapeutic, and intensive care facilities in a medical center. Its outpatient clinics/centers include allergy, arrhythmia, behavioral health, breastfeeding, breast care, children, dental, diabetes, diagnostic, dialysis, digestive disease, emergency, eye, fertility and IVF, health screening, hearing and balance, heart valve, cancer, hyperbaric oxygen therapy, hypertension, joint replacement, liver, memory, men, nephrology, neuroscience, new life healthy aging, orthopedic, Parkinson's disease and movement disorders, perinatal, physical therapy and rehabilitation, plastic surgery, pulmonary, refractive surgery, robotic scoliosis and surgery, skin, sleep lab, spine, sports medicine and lifestyle, surgical, travel medicine, urology, vitalife, and women's, as well as ear, nose, and throat centers. In addition, the company is involved in the real estate assets holding activities; provision of clinical research services; distribution of pharmaceutical and medical goods in specialized stores; operation of personnel development and training center for healthcare services; and patient referral service business. It operates 580 beds and approximately 56 clinics/centers. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BIZ-R.BK.summary: Business Alignment Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and installation of medical equipment and software system for cancer treatment through radiotherapy in Thailand. It imports and distributes radiation machine equipment. The company is also involved in the construction of building for locating medical equipment; and providing repair and maintenance services for medical equipment. It serves hospitals, ministry of public health, and public health departments and organizations. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHG-R.BK.summary: Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited operates clinics and hospitals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. It also distributes medical instruments and dietary supplement products. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 13 branches of clinics and hospitals. Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CHG.BK.summary: Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited operates clinics and hospitals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. It also distributes medical instruments and dietary supplement products. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 13 branches of clinics and hospitals. Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CMR-R.BK.long_name: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited
CMR-R.BK.summary: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a medical care center in Thailand. It offers medical services in the areas of internal medicine, cardiology, general practice, pediatric, orthopedic and general surgery, pediatric surgery, obstetrics-gynecology, radiology, dentistry, anesthetic, ENT, and eye; and operates sub-specialty clinics for urology, neurology, endocrinology, oncology, hematology, plastic surgery, GI tract, and dermatology, as well as infertile and gynecologic oncology clinics. The company also provides dental, X-ray, CT colonoscopy, cardiac catheterization, gynecologic cancer, back pain, physical therapy and rehabilitation, operating theatre, laboratory examination, real-time PCR, ambulance, and health check-up services; and insurance products. It operates a medical care center under the Lanna Hospital name. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited.

CMR.BK.long_name: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited
CMR.BK.summary: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a medical care center in Thailand. It offers medical services in the areas of internal medicine, cardiology, general practice, pediatric, orthopedic and general surgery, pediatric surgery, obstetrics-gynecology, radiology, dentistry, anesthetic, ENT, and eye; and operates sub-specialty clinics for urology, neurology, endocrinology, oncology, hematology, plastic surgery, GI tract, and dermatology, as well as infertile and gynecologic oncology clinics. It operates a medical care center under the Lanna Hospital name. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited.

D.BK.summary: Dental Corporation Public Company Limited provides dental services and products in Thailand. It provides dental diagnosis and general dentistry, oral surgery, dental implants, cosmetics dentistry, endodontic dentistry, periodontics dentistry, prosthodontic dentistry, and orthodontic dentistry services, as well as dental laboratory services; and distributes dental supplies and equipment. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 14 branches. Dental Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EFORL-R.BK.short_name: E FOR L AIM PUBLIC COMPANY LIMI
EFORL-R.BK.long_name: E for L Aim Public Company Limited
EFORL-R.BK.summary: E for L Aim Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes medical devices and in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Distributor of Medical Devices and Equipment, and Beauty Treatments. The company also offers healthiness and beauty products, such as cosmetic, healthy drinks, and supplementary food products, as well as snail slime products; educational, and clinical and laboratory microscopes, as well as microscopes for biological scientific researches; and medical laboratory services. In addition, it provides franchising services. The company was formerly known as Absolute Impact Public Company Limited and changed its name to E for L Aim Public Company Limited in September 2013. E for L Aim Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

EFORL.BK.short_name: E FOR L AIM PUBLIC COMPANY LIMI

EKH-R.BK.long_name: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited
EKH-R.BK.summary: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates Ekachai hospital in Thailand. It offers plastic surgery, fertility and genetic, pediatric, obstertrics and gynaecology, general medicine clinic, general surgery, orthopedics, ophthalmology, emergency, health promotion, hemodialysis, dental, physical, mobile checkup, pre-employment checkup, aesthetic and dermatology center, and child and teen development center services, as well as ambulatory care services for patients with injuries, functional limitations, disability, and diseases. Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

EKH.BK.long_name: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited
EKH.BK.summary: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates Ekachai hospital in Thailand. It offers plastic surgery, fertility and genetic, pediatric, obstertrics and gynaecology, general medicine clinic, general surgery, orthopedics, ophthalmology, emergency, health promotion, hemodialysis, dental, physical, mobile checkup, pre-employment checkup, aesthetic and dermatology center, and child and teen development center services, as well as ambulatory care services for patients with injuries, functional limitations, disability, and diseases. Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

IMH-R.BK.long_name: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited
IMH-R.BK.summary: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited operates a network of private hospitals. Its occupational health services include annual health checkups, health risk assessments, and pre-occupational checkups, as well as health checkup services for foreign workers, out patient department services, vaccination, and first aid and cardiopulmonary resuscitation training services. The company also provides environment monitoring services, such as occupational health and safety monitoring, vent air quality monitoring, general atmospheric monitoring, and water quality monitoring services, as well as monitoring, sample collection, and analysis services according to the environmental impact assessment protocol. Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IMH.BK.long_name: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited
IMH.BK.summary: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited operates a network of private hospitals. Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IP.BK.summary: Inter Pharma Public Company Limited develops, produces, and sells healthcare products in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Human Healthcare and Animal Healthcare. The company offers human beauty products, such as medical supplies, nutrition therapy, cosmetics, supplementary foods, probiotic and prebiotic products, health food products, general food products, medical equipment and medicines, etc.; a range of wellness and anti-aging products; aesthetic products, such as anti-wrinkle creams, hyaluronic fillers, and EGF cosmeceuticals; and diagnostic products, including blood group tests and cool box systems. It also provides pet healthcare and livestock products comprising medical supplies, nutrition therapy, vaccines, supplementary foods, probiotic and prebiotic products, animal health food products, premium grade animal foods, general formula animal foods, etc., as well as medical equipment related to pet and livestock care products. In addition, the company imports and distributes dietary supplement products for humans and animals. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KDH-R.BK.long_name: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited
KDH-R.BK.summary: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. It offers services in the areas of hair loss, weight loss and gain, sexual health, facial treatment, and beauty and cosmetic surgery, as well as eyebrows, mustache, beard, and sideburns growth. The company was formerly known as Krungdhon Hospital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited in April 2013. Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KDH.BK.long_name: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited

LDC-R.BK.summary: LDC Dental Public Company Limited provides dental care services in Thailand. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated a network of 30 branches. LDC Dental Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

LDC.BK.summary: LDC Dental Public Company Limited provides dental care services in Thailand. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated a network of 30 branches. LDC Dental Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

LPH-R.BK.long_name: Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited
LPH-R.BK.summary: Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospital business in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Hospital, and Scientific Laboratory Testing & Research. The company operates Ladprao General Hospital, a private hospital with a capacity of approximately 200 in-patient beds and with approximately 500 physicians in various fields. Its hospital provides services in the areas of internal medicine, pediatrics, women's health, ophthalmology, otolaryngology, general surgery, orthopedic surgery, cardiology and neurology, skin and beauty, dentistry and hemodialysis, etc. The company also offers scientific analytical and diagnostic, and research services for medical, agricultural, food and drug industries; inspection and certification of quality systems; agricultural plant protection product efficiency assessment services; testing and analysis services for pesticide residues and hazardous substances; and hospital management and consulting services, as well as provides health mobile checkup and nurse services in factories and agencies. Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LPH.BK.long_name: Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited
LPH.BK.summary: Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospital business in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Hospital, and Scientific Laboratory Testing & Research. The company operates Ladprao General Hospital, a private hospital with a capacity of approximately 200 in-patient beds and with approximately 500 physicians in various fields. Its hospital provides services in the areas of internal medicine, pediatrics, women's health, ophthalmology, otolaryngology, general surgery, orthopedic surgery, cardiology and neurology, skin and beauty, dentistry and hemodialysis, etc. The company also offers scientific analytical and diagnostic, and research services for medical, agricultural, food and drug industries; inspection and certification of quality systems; agricultural plant protection product efficiency assessment services; testing and analysis services for pesticide residues and hazardous substances; and hospital management and consulting services, as well as provides health mobile checkup and nurse services in factories and agencies. Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

M-CHAI-R.BK.summary: Mahachai Hospital Public Company Limited operates private hospitals under the Mahachai Hospital name in Thailand. It also trades in medical and other supplies. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

M-CHAI.BK.summary: Mahachai Hospital Public Company Limited operates private hospitals under the Mahachai Hospital name in Thailand. It also trades in medical and other supplies. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

MEGA.BK.summary: Mega Lifesciences Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, and sells health food supplements, prescription pharmaceutical products, over-the-counter (OTC) products, herbal products, vitamins, and fast moving consumer goods. The company operates through Brands, Distribution, and Original Equipment Manufacture segments. It provides various complementary medicines for bone and joint, children, diabetic, heart, herbal, liver and digestive, skin, slimming, and well-being care, as well as men's and women's care products and sports supplements; gastrointestinal and pain care OTC medicines; and prescription medicines in the areas of iron supplement, anticoagulant, diabetology, cardiology, dermatology, gastroenterology, neurology, pain, osteoporosis, respiratory, urology, oncology, and nephrology. The company also offers logistical and marketing services for the sale of goods manufactured by third parties. In addition, the company engages in the operation of wellness center; and software design, development, and other services business. It operates in the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Africa, and the Commonwealth of Independent States. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Mega Lifesciences Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Unistretch Limited.

NEW-R.BK.summary: Wattana Karnpaet Public Company Limited engages in hospital and medical trading businesses in Thailand. It operates 100 beds private hospital under the North Eastern Wattana Hospital name. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Udon Thani, Thailand.

NEW.BK.summary: Wattana Karnpaet Public Company Limited engages in hospital and medical trading businesses in Thailand. It operates 100 beds private hospital under the North Eastern Wattana Hospital name. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Udon Thani, Thailand.

NTV-R.BK.summary: Nonthavej Hospital Public Company Limited operates as a tertiary care private hospital in Thailand. The company provides medical services for inpatients and outpatients, as well as emergency cases with 24-hour ambulance service. It operates specialized medical centers and clinics that offer services in the areas of laparoscope surgery, breast cancer, children and teens, neurology, dental, diabetes, diagnostic digital imaging, emergency, gastrointestinal system and liver, general medicine, gynecologic cancer treatment, gynecologic laparoscopic surgery and gynecologic cancer, gynecological, hemodialysis, ICU and CCU, minimally invasive surgery, nephrology, operations, orthopedics, physical medicine and rehabilitation, pregnancy, respiration, skin and cosmetic surgery, sleep lab, vascular, and wellness, as well as eye, ear, nose, and throat. The company also provides health checkup, ambulatory, and ward facility services. As of December 31, 2020, it had 208 beds for inpatients and 90 examination rooms for outpatients. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

NTV.BK.summary: Nonthavej Hospital Public Company Limited operates as a tertiary care private hospital in Thailand. The company also provides health checkup, ambulatory, and ward facility services. As of December 31, 2020, it had 208 beds for inpatients and 90 examination rooms for outpatients. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

PR9-R.BK.summary: Praram 9 Hospital Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Praram 9 Hospital name in Thailand. The company offers a range of tertiary care services, including health promotion, preventive healthcare, diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation in the medical areas of obstetrics and gynecology, surgery, medicine, pediatrics, orthopedist, kidney transplant, and cardiovascular. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 166 licensed beds. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PR9.BK.summary: Praram 9 Hospital Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Praram 9 Hospital name in Thailand. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 166 licensed beds. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRINC.BK.summary: Principal Capital Public Company Limited operates and manages private hospitals in Thailand. The company also engages in operating serviced apartments; office building rental; and property development and rental activities. In addition, it provides office building management services. The company was formerly known as Metro Star Property Public Company Limited and changed its name to Principal Capital Public Company Limited in August 2013. Principal Capital Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RAM-R.BK.summary: Ramkhamhaeng Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a private hospital that provides medical services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. Its hospital includes 3 patient buildings with approximately 485 beds. The company also sells medical equipment and instruments. Ramkhamhaeng Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RAM.BK.summary: Ramkhamhaeng Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a private hospital that provides medical services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. Its hospital includes 3 patient buildings with approximately 485 beds. The company also sells medical equipment and instruments. Ramkhamhaeng Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RJH-R.BK.summary: Rajthanee Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides healthcare services in Thailand. The company offers health improvement, rehabilitation, and medical prevention services. It also provides medical services in areas, such as medicine, surgery and orthopedics, pediatrics, obstetrics and gynecology, otolaryngology, ophthalmology, anesthesiology, radiology, and dentistry. The company operates cardiology, emergency accident, orthopedic, hemodialysis, children's, health screening, dental, and radiology centers. It has 353 registered beds. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

RJH.BK.summary: Rajthanee Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides healthcare services in Thailand. The company offers health improvement, rehabilitation, and medical prevention services. It also provides medical services in areas, such as medicine, surgery and orthopedics, pediatrics, obstetrics and gynecology, otolaryngology, ophthalmology, anesthesiology, radiology, and dentistry. RPH-R.BK.summary: Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business under the Rachaphruek Hospital name in Thailand. The company provides medical services in the field of internal medicine, such as dermatology, neurology, hematology, pulmonary, rheumatology, gastroenterology, nephrology, and cardiology; general, urological, and colorectal surgeries; and pediatrics, orthopedics, otorhinolaryngology, ophthalmology, obstetrics and gynecology, check-up, dentistry, anesthesiology, emergency medical, rehabilitation, and diagnostic radiology. It also sells medicines and medical supplies. The company was formerly known as Sithan Karnpat Company Limited and changed its name to Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited in September 2016. Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

RPH.BK.summary: Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business under the Rachaphruek Hospital name in Thailand. The company provides medical services in the field of internal medicine, such as dermatology, neurology, hematology, pulmonary, rheumatology, gastroenterology, nephrology, and cardiology; general, urological, and colorectal surgeries; and pediatrics, orthopedics, otorhinolaryngology, ophthalmology, obstetrics and gynecology, check-up, dentistry, anesthesiology, emergency medical, rehabilitation, and diagnostic radiology. It also sells medicines and medical supplies. The company was formerly known as Sithan Karnpat Company Limited and changed its name to Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited in September 2016. Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

SKR-R.BK.summary: Sikarin Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. It operates diabetes and endocrine center, general medicine clinic, orthopedic center, emergency and trauma center, surgery clinic, children center, dental center, aesthetic center, laboratory department, diagnostic radiology center, CT scan unit, operating rooms, hemodialysis unit, physical therapy department with physical medicine and rehabilitation specialist, catheter laboratory, intensive care units, coronary care unit, inpatient wards and international wards, after heart and thoracic surgery ward, medical ward, and pediatric ward. The company also operates woman's health center, health center, fertility center, delivery room, nursery department and the inpatient wards, obstetrics and gynecology ward, gastroenterology and scope center, neurology center, stroke center, EENT center, international medical center, and MRI center. It is also involved in the management of rental spaces; and sale of food and beverages. The company's hospitals comprise Sikarin Hospital with 355 beds in Bangkok; Rattarin Hospital with 100 beds in Muang; and Sikarin Hat-Yai Hospital with 350 beds in Hat Yai. Sikarin Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Sikarin Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SVH-R.BK.summary: Samitivej Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospital business in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. It operates hospitals, as well as offers various programs and services for large corporations, embassies, and international schools. The company also provides asset management services for healthcare business; distributes health and cosmetics products; and operates a clinic. In addition, it engages in the facility management and investment businesses. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Samitivej Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited.

Samitivej Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited.

THG-R.BK.long_name: Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited
THG-R.BK.summary: Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited operates private hospitals in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Medical Services Business, Healthcare Solution Provider, and Other Business. It offers services in various medical fields, including brain and neurology, bone and joint, gastro intestinal and liver, heart, and obstetrics and gynecology; and management services for provincial state hospitals, as well as for heart centers in the public and private sectors. The company also offers senior care and senior living, and home healthcare services; provides cleaning services, disinfecting and removal of dust mites; operates the patient rehabilitation center; conducts housing business for elderly; and operates care center and elderly carecenter, as well as distributes dental supplies brands, such as Adec, W&H, AO, Heraeus, Ivoclar, Megagen, SAM, Melag, and Alpro. It also sells pharmaceutical and medical goods in specialised stores; develops hospital management software; and develops land and property. The company operates three Bangkok-based hospitals, such as Thonburi, Thonburi2 and Thonburi Bamrungmuang hospitals; and four provincial hospitals, including Rajyindee, Ubonrak Thonburi, Sirivej Chanthaburi, and Thonburi Thungsong hospitals. Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TM.BK.summary: Techno Medical Public Company Limited trades in medical supplies, tools, and equipment in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Disposable Equipment and Supplies, and Medical Equipment and Instrument. Techno Medical Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNH-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited
TNH-R.BK.summary: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the areas of heart, bone and joint, holistic oncology, hemodialysis, skin and laser, traditional Chinese medicine, ear, nose, throat, pediatrics, obstetrics, gynecology, medicine, dental, surgery, emergency, physical therapy, gastrointestinal, breast care, lasik, diabetes, endocrinology, brain, neurology, hepato-biliary, pancreas, X-ray, and eye, as well as operates check-up centers. Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNH.BK.long_name: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited
TNH.BK.summary: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the areas of heart, bone and joint, holistic oncology, hemodialysis, skin and laser, traditional Chinese medicine, ear, nose, throat, pediatrics, obstetrics, gynecology, medicine, dental, surgery, emergency, physical therapy, gastrointestinal, breast care, lasik, diabetes, endocrinology, brain, neurology, hepato-biliary, pancreas, X-ray, and eye, as well as operates check-up centers. Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOG.BK.long_name: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited
TOG.BK.summary: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic lens and related products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Plastic and Glass Lens; and Other Products and Services. The Plastic and Glass Lens segment produces and sells optical lenses. It offers CR39, photochromic, high index, high impact resistant, sunÂfiltered, and polarized lenses; and mineral and prescription lenses. The Other Products and Services segment is involved in the sale of glass molds; trade of goods purchased for resale; surface treatment of hard coatings; as well as anti-reflection coating services for organic lenses. The company distributes its products on an original equipment manufacturer basis, as well as under its Excelite, Excelite Trivex, Excelite Tribrid, ONE, Discovery, freedom, and MAXIMA brands. It also exports its products to Europe, Australia, rest of Asia and Pacific, the United States, Africa, and the Middle East. Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited serves wholesalers and retailers. The company was formerly known as Thai Polymer Lens Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited in 2004. Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.

VIBHA-R.BK.long_name: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited
VIBHA-R.BK.summary: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Vibhavadi Hospital name in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. The company provides medical services; and room rental and hotel services. In addition, it engages in the beauty business. Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VIBHA.BK.long_name: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited
VIBHA.BK.summary: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Vibhavadi Hospital name in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. The company provides medical services; and room rental and hotel services. In addition, it engages in the beauty business. Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VIH-R.BK.summary: Srivichaivejvivat Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. Its medical services include treatment for the various heart disease, such as coronary artery bypass grafting, valvular repair/replacement, and congenital heart disease correction; various health check-up programs; services related to child development; various emergency services; and orthopedic service related to joint pain, hip pain, knee pain, trigger finger, hand pain, elbow or shoulder pain, etc. The company also provides treatment for cardiovascular disease, neurological and brain, allergy, cancer, respiratory diseases and lung, urinary tract and liver, sports injury, woman and occupational disease, digestive disease, and diabetes and endocrine, as well as blood, kidneys, and skin; and general radiography, fluoroscopy, computed tomography scanning services. In addition, it offers occupational therapy, elderly, and pediatric rehabilitation services, as well as rehabilitation services of patients with spinal cord injury, bone and joint, back pain, neck pain, shoulder pain, heart disease, cancer disease, and neuropathy; and services related to diagnosing bone and muscle abnormalities. Further, the company provides gastrointestinal, neurological, plastic, urology, orthopedics, laparoscopic, and cardiac surgery, as well as staple hemorrhoidectomy; treatment for ear, nose, and throat, such as otitis, sinusitis, etc.; hemodialysis procedure that cleans and filters the blood; dialysis services; anti-aging services; treatment for eye diseases; dermatological and dental services; medical treatment with traditional Chinese medicine; maternal and child care services. It also operates a vocational school. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Krathum Baen, Thailand.

WPH-R.BK.long_name: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited
WPH-R.BK.summary: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited owns and operates hospitals and clinics in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the field of hemodialysis, surgery, gynecology, delivery and newborn, clinical pediatrics, skin and beauty, dental clinic, physical therapy clinic, and ophthalmology, as well as ear, nose, and throat; and operates dialysis, X-ray, MRI, and wellness centers. It serves people through its 120-bed hospital. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Trang, Thailand.
